thread.title: LSU No. 19 in preseason men’s hoops poll
thread.title_full: LSU No. 19 in preseason men’s hoops poll

title: LSU No. 19 in preseason men’s hoops poll
text:
LSU No. 19 in preseason men’s hoops poll The LSU Tigers will begin the men’s basketball season ranked No. 19. Post to Facebook LSU No. 19 in preseason men’s hoops poll The LSU Tigers will begin the men’s basketball season ranked No. 19. Check out this story on shreveporttimes.com: http://www.shreveporttimes.com/story/sports/college/lsu/2015/10/15/lsu-preseason-mens-hoops-poll/73991562/ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation Scott Ferrell, Louisiana 11:33 a.m. CDT October 15, 2015 Keith Hornsby and the LSU Tigers are ranked No. 19 in USA Today’s preseason men’s basketball coaches’ poll. (Photo: Derick E. Hingle/USA TODAY Sports) 
The arrival of Ben Simmons, Antonio Blakeney and Brandon Sampson has helped catapult the LSU Tigers into the top 25 of the men’s basketball preseason coaches’ poll at No. 19. 
Kentucky and North Carolina tied for the top spot in the poll. 
LSU was 22-11 last season and reached the first round of the NCAA Tournament before losing to North Carolina State. The Tigers lost Jordan Mickey and Jarell Martin to the NBA off of that team. 
Among the returnees who played prominent roles for LSU a year ago are Keith Hornsby, Tim Quarterman, Josh Gray and Jaylyn Patterson. 
“We know we have a long way to go,’’ LSU coach Johnny Jones said Wednesday. “The players know they’ve still got a big learning curve and they’re anxious to get better, but I think they’re looking forward to the challenges and really getting started.’’ 
Vanderbilt is the only other SEC team ranked in the top 25. The Commodores are ranked No. 20. 
USA Today Preseason Coaches Poll 
Oct. 15, 2015

t1, North Carolina (12) 26-12, 749

7, Iowa St., 25-9, 541
